discover.instruction: Read about things people wish were different. Notice the verb tenses after 'wish'.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай о том, что люди хотели бы изменить. Обрати внимание на времена глаголов после 'wish'.

content.text: I <highlight>wish</highlight> I <highlight>had</highlight> more free time. I'm always so busy! My friend <highlight>wishes</highlight> she <highlight>spoke</highlight> better English. She <highlight>wishes</highlight> she <highlight>could</highlight> travel more easily. I <highlight>wish</highlight> I <highlight>were</highlight> taller - I can't reach the top shelf! My brother <highlight>wishes</highlight> he <highlight>didn't have to</highlight> work on weekends. We all <highlight>wish</highlight> life <highlight>were</highlight> simpler. I <highlight>wish</highlight> I <highlight>knew</highlight> how to cook. My parents <highlight>wish</highlight> we <highlight>lived</highlight> closer to them.
content.question: What tense comes after 'wish'? Are these real situations or imaginary?
content.question_ru: Какое время идёт после 'wish'? Это реальные ситуации или воображаемые?

theory.title: Wish + Past Simple for Present Wishes
theory.title_ru: Wish + Past Simple для желаний о настоящем

points.rule: wish + past simple = want situation to be different NOW
points.rule_ru: wish + past simple = хотим, чтобы ситуация была другой СЕЙЧАС
points.example: I wish I had a car. (I don't have one now)
I wish I were rich. I wish she were here.

points.rule: wish + could = ability/possibility we don't have
points.example: I wish I could fly. I wish I could speak Chinese.

points.rule_ru: Сравни: If only = более сильное желание
points.example: If only I had more money! (= I really wish...)

comparison_table.wish: I wish I had a car.
I wish I didn't have to work.
I wish I knew the answer.

notice.instruction: Find all wishes. What is the reality vs what they wish?
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все желания. Какова реальность vs что они хотят?

tasks.text:
Life is full of wishes!

I'm not rich. I wish I were rich. Then I could travel anywhere!
I don't speak Japanese. I wish I spoke Japanese. Japan is so interesting.
I can't play the piano. I wish I could play the piano. Music is beautiful.
I live in a small apartment. I wish I lived in a big house.
I have to wake up early. I wish I didn't have to wake up so early.
My job isn't exciting. I wish my job were more exciting.
I don't know many people here. I wish I knew more people.
The weather is terrible. If only it were sunny!

notice.reflection_question: Why do we use past tense to talk about present wishes?
notice.reflection_question_ru: Почему мы используем прошедшее время, чтобы говорить о желаниях в настоящем?

exercises.instruction: Write wishes based on the reality.

sentences.wish: I wish I had a garden.

sentences.reality: We live far from the beach.
sentences.wish: I wish we lived near the beach.
I wish I knew her name.
I wish it weren't/wasn't so cold.
I wish I didn't have to work tomorrow.
I wish my apartment were/was bigger.
I wish I could remember his face.

sentences.sentence: I'm so tired. I wish I ___ (be) more energetic.
I don't speak French. I wish I ___ (speak) French.
She can't come. I wish she ___ (can) come.
I don't have time. I wish I ___ (have) more time.
He doesn't love me. I wish he ___ (love) me.
We have to leave early. I wish we ___ (not/have to) leave.
I'm not tall enough. I wish I ___ (be) taller.

sentences.incorrect: She wishes she can speak English.
sentences.correct: She wishes she could speak English.

sentences.incorrect: I wish I don't have to work.
sentences.correct: I wish I didn't have to work.

produce.instruction: Write about things you wish were different in your life now.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши о вещах, которые ты хотел бы изменить в своей жизни сейчас.
prompts: What do you wish about your job or studies?
What do you wish about your abilities or skills?
What do you wish about your life circumstances?
What do you wish about the world?
produce.example: There are many things I wish were different in my life. I wish I had more free time. I work too much and I wish I didn't have to work on weekends. I wish I could travel more - there are so many places I want to see! I wish I spoke more languages. If only I had studied Chinese at school! I also wish I lived closer to my family. They live far away and I wish I could see them more often. I wish life weren't so expensive in this city. But mostly, I wish I could stop worrying and just enjoy the present moment!

texts.title: City Life
texts.content: I live in a big city but I wish I lived in the countryside. I wish there were more trees and less traffic. I wish I could hear birds instead of car horns. My apartment is small - I wish it were bigger. I wish I didn't have to pay such high rent. I wish my neighbors weren't so noisy. If only life in the city were more peaceful! I wish I could change things.

texts.title: Work Complaints
texts.content: My job is okay, but I have some complaints. I wish I earned more money. I wish my boss were more understanding. I wish I didn't have so many meetings. I wish I could work from home more often. I wish my commute weren't so long. I wish I had more creative projects. If only I could do what I really love! But I know many people wish they had a job at all.

texts.title: Student Life
texts.content: Being a student is hard! I wish I were better at math. I wish I could understand everything the first time. I wish I didn't have to study so much. I wish exams weren't so stressful. I wish I had more money for textbooks. I wish my professor were more patient. If only I knew what career to choose! I wish someone could give me the answers!

texts.title: Relationship Wishes
texts.content: Relationships are complicated! My friend wishes her boyfriend were more romantic. He wishes she weren't so demanding. She wishes he understood her better. He wishes they didn't argue so much. I wish my friends could get along better. They wish I weren't so busy all the time. We all wish we had more time together. If only life weren't so hectic!

texts.title: Global Wishes
texts.content: I often think about the world and have many wishes. I wish there were no wars. I wish everyone had enough food and water. I wish the environment weren't being destroyed. I wish world leaders were wiser. I wish I could do more to help. I wish people weren't so divided. If only we could all live in peace! I wish kindness were more common. Small wishes can lead to big changes.
